name: Spectral Showdown
description:
Do you like Prop Hunt? Too bad! This is Spectral Showdown!

Overview

In Spectral Showdown, You possess creatures and fight your friends, family or greatest enemies to the death using the creature's abilities! Similar to prop hunt, but animals instead! The last one standing wins! Play offline or online and watch as your friendships begin to crumble! Unlock achievements for being the greatest fighter out of your friends or even for simply trying your best (we won't judge).

Key Features

  • Offline/Online play (includes LAN) for up to 4 players.
  • Same keyboard support so you can play together on the same keyboard (offline-only).
  • 2 Maps.
  • Achievements.
  • Steam Cloud Support (to make sure your settings are on the cloud)!
  • Cartoony style.
